author: Youssef1313
body: `Dispose()` call was missing on CancellationTokenSource in CimChildJobBase and TestConnectionCommand.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: A useful tool for work like this is: [IDisposableAnalyzers](https://github.com/DotNetAnalyzers/IDisposableAnalyzers) (alpha release).

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:

title: Add missing dispose for CancellationTokenSource
